mapper.select: select id, name, content, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ws_wall where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ws_wall(name, content, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{name}, #{content}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into ws_wall(name, content, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.content}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ws_wall(name, content, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.content}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), content = values(content), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ws_wall
name = #{name},
content = #{content},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
